group_1.narration: "I'll get Dad to recognize my determination@by shooting a short film."@...That's what I decided.
The production period turned out to be brutal,@since I had to finish the whole thing@within a short span of time.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah. It'll only be short-form, but I was@hoping you guys could help me out?

group_1.textRight: Sure!@We shot one together already, right?
Yeah, that was rad! Used our whole summer@vacation for it, but y'know.

group_1.textLeft: I'm under a bit of a deadline this time, so I'm@hoping we can finish filming within 10 days.
(The deadline for the career survey is 2 weeks from now...)
(When I factor in the time for editing, we've got@10 days tops.)

group_1.textRight: That means we'll probably need a lot of people, so@I'll try hitting up the guys in Theatre Club.
We can pitch in too! It sounds like fun!

group_1.textLeft: Great! You guys are lifesavers~!

group_1.textRight: So, what kind of movie do you wanna make?

group_1.textLeft: A kaiju movie!
Yeah.@That genre was my inception, after all.
The reason I started liking movies in the@first place!
See, when I was really little...
I saw this kaiju movie by Director Yamada Joey...
...And it was like-- pow! Got me right in the@soul.

group_1.textRight: The last movie you did was a totally different@genre.
I thought you were just a regular kind of@film buff.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, same!
But Yamada Joey, huh...?@I've never heard of him...
Ah, here he is.
Looks like he hasn't made anything new for@over a decade, huh.

group_1.textRight: I've never seen any of these movies, either.
Looks like the reviews were pretty good, though.

group_1.textLeft: Well, yeah... I guess he's only really popular@with people in the know. It's a shame.

group_1.textRight: Nice job finding a cult classic like that,@though?
And when you were super little, to boot.

group_1.textLeft: I know, right? Maybe it was fate!
Oh... but what are we gonna do for the kaiju?
We're filming a kaiju movie, right? We can@play the human characters ourselves, but...

group_1.textRight: Can we get ahold of a suit or something?@Or, like, full CG somehow?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that.
Not to worry!@It'll be a kaiju movie, sure...
But the human element will be the main focus.
